mapper.select: select g.guide_id, g.career,g.dc,g.duty,g.attach,g.attach_dir,g.state_cd,cm.cd_name,m.nick,m.name,m.auth from guide g,member m,cmmncd cm where g.state_cd = 1 and cm.cd_ini = 'S' and g.state_cd = cm.cd_no and g.guide_id = m.member_id
mapper.update: update guide set state_cd = #{stateCd} where guide_id=#{guideId};
